title: (x) upright italic Cine Nacional - Footlight {James}
content:
do you know the name of this face?   
   
 ![picture](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054830im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69317.jpg)   
   
   
thanks   
Jason
author: jasonr

comments.content:
Ugh. Stephen, are you serious?   
   
Actually, it was Ong Chong Wah, according to the Precision Type Font Reference Guide.
Oops, never mind. I thought you thought Baker designed Footlight.

your guys are great!   
   
thank you again   
   
Jason
